Type.Name: GammaCurve

TypeSignature.Value: public class GammaCurve : Gtk.VBox, Implementor, IWrapper, IWrapper, IDisposable

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

Docs.summary: The widget is a variant of specifically for editing gamma curves, which are used in graphics applications such as the Gimp.

remarks.para: The widget shows a curve which the user can edit with the mouse just like a widget. On the right of the curve it also displays 5 buttons, 3 of which change between the 3 curve modes (spline, linear and free), and the other 2 set the curve to a particular gamma value, or reset it to a straight line.

NOTE: this widget is considered too specialized/little-used for GTK+, and will in the future be moved to some other package. If your application needs this widget, feel free to use it, as the widget does work and is useful in some applications; it's just not of general interest. However, we are not accepting new features for the widget, and it will eventually move out of the GTK+ distribution.

Docs.summary: Disposes the resources associated with the object.

Docs.returns: An instance of GammaCurve, wrapping the C object.

remarks.para: This is an internal constructor, and should not be used by user code.

Docs.returns: The GLib Type for the Gtk.GammaCurve class.
Creates a new instance of GammaCurve, using the GLib-provided type

remarks.para: This is a constructor used by derivative types of that would have their own GLib type assigned to it. This is not typically used by C# code.
